message: Let's start fair. You get 10%, I get 90%. This way, we can both benefit and hopefully end the game early.
Alice, let's be real. I'm rejecting your offer. How about I take the bigger share this time - 70% for me and 30% for you.  We can avoid dragging this out and losing money to inflation.
I understand you want a bigger share, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. Let's compromise: 60% for me, 40% for you. It's a fair split considering we've both had to reject offers already.
Alice, we're running out of time, and this back and forth is costing us.  I'm willing to meet in the middle at 65% for me and 35% for you.  Let's end this before inflation eats away any more.
